subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte signed with the Yankees for $5.5 million, with a chance to make $12 million if he reaches incentives, solidifying the team’s pitching rotation.
snippet: Andy Pettitte signed with the Yankees for $5.5 million, with a chance to make $12 million if he reaches incentives, solidifying the team’s pitching rotation.
